name: What in tarnation?! Reincarnation!!?
description:
What's that!? Zombies are coming from the ol' Graveyard?! The Outlaws have been reincarnated! Sheriff! Go and protect this little town! Stop the waves of the zombie outlaws!

In this FPS wave defender game, you play as the sheriff defending the town from zombies! Pick up lots of ammo and defend the town!
